comment: An orthogonality relation for Dirichlet characters: the sum of ` x ( A ) ` for fixed ` A ` and all ` x ` is ` 0 ` if ` A = 1 ` and ` phi ( n ) ` otherwise. Theorem 6.5.1 of [Shapiro] p. 230. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
